nodes.text: The Ternin system was a star system that was located in the Alchenaut sector, within the Western Reaches portion of the Expansion Region. The system was the origin point of Ternin tree slings, a low-technology type of slings.
The Ternin system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square L-16.
